verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> now there was אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> And there was a man מֵֽהַר־ <WH2022> of mount אֶפְרָ֖יִם <WH669> Ephraim וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> whose name מִיכָֽיְהוּ׃ <WH4319> Micaiah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said לְאִמּ֡וֹ <WH517> unto his mother אֶלֶף֩ <WH505> thousand וּמֵאָ֨ה <WH3967> hundred הַכֶּ֜סֶף <WH3701> [shekels] of silver אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֻֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> that were taken לָ֗ךְ [וְאַתִּי כ] (וְאַ֤תְּ <WH859> you ק) אָלִית֙ <WH422> from thee about which thou cursedst וְגַם֙ <WH1571> again אָמַ֣רְתְּ <WH559> and spakest בְּאָזְנַ֔י <WH241> of also in mine ears הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> behold הַכֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> behold the silver אִתִּ֖י <WH854> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I לְקַחְתִּ֑יו <WH3947> [is] with me I took וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> it And his mother בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed בְּנִ֖י <WH1121> my son לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [be thou] of the LORD

וַיָּ֛שֶׁב <WH7725> And when he had restored אֶת־ <WH853> אֶֽלֶף־ <WH505> thousand וּמֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> hundred הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> [shekels] of silver לְאִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> to his mother וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אִמּ֡וֹ <WH517> his mother הַקְדֵּ֣שׁ <WH6942> I had wholly הִקְדַּ֣שְׁתִּי <WH6942> dedicated אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּסֶף֩ <WH3701> the silver לַיהוָ֨ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מִיָּדִ֜י <WH3027> from my hand לִבְנִ֗י <WH1121> for my son לַֽעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> to make פֶּ֣סֶל <WH6459> a graven image וּמַסֵּכָ֔ה <WH4541> and a molten image וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now אֲשִׁיבֶ֥נּוּ <WH7725> now therefore I will restore לָֽךְ׃

וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <WH7725> Yet he restored אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> the money לְאִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> unto his mother וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took אִמּוֹ֩ <WH517> and his mother מָאתַ֨יִם <WH3967> two hundred כֶּ֜סֶף <WH3701> [shekels] of silver וַתִּתְּנֵ֣הוּ <WH5414> and gave לַצּוֹרֵ֗ף <WH6884> them to the founder וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <WH6213> who made פֶּ֣סֶל <WH6459> thereof a graven image וּמַסֵּכָ֔ה <WH4541> and a molten image וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> were in בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> and they were in the house מִיכָֽיְהוּ׃ <WH4319> Micaiah

וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And the man מִיכָ֔ה <WH4318> Micah ל֖וֹ בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> had an house אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of gods וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> and made אֵפוֹד֙ <WH646> an ephod וּתְרָפִ֔ים <WH8655> and teraphim וַיְמַלֵּ֗א <WH4390> accomplish אֶת־ <WH853> יַ֤ד <WH3027> able אַחַד֙ <WH259> one מִבָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> of his sons וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> become ל֖וֹ לְכֹהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> who became his priest

בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those אֵ֥ין <WH369> there מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> [there was] no king בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> [but] every man הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> in his own eyes יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> did פ

וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> now there was נַ֗עַר <WH5288> And there was a young man מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH1035> Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah מִמִּשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> of the family יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וְה֥וּא <WH1931> who לֵוִ֖י <WH3881> who [was] a Levite וְה֥וּא <WH1931> who גָֽר־ <WH1481> and he sojourned שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> departed הָאִ֜ישׁ <WH376> And the man מֵהָעִ֗יר <WH5892> out of the city מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH1035> Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah לָג֖וּר <WH1481> to sojourn בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> wherever יִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> where he could find וַיָּבֹ֧א <WH935> [a place] and he came הַר־ <WH2022> to mount אֶפְרַ֛יִם <WH669> Ephraim עַד־ <WH5704> against בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> to the house מִיכָ֖ה <WH4318> of Micah לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> made דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH1870> his journey

וַיֹּאמֶר־ <WH559> said ל֥וֹ מִיכָ֖ה <WH4318> And Micah מֵאַ֣יִן <WH370> unto him Whence תָּב֑וֹא <WH935> comest וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> thou? And he said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him לֵוִ֣י <WH3881> unto him I [am] a Levite אָנֹ֗כִי <WH595> I מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH1035> Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> and I הֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> and I go לָג֖וּר <WH1481> to sojourn בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> wherever אֶמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> where I may find

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said ל֨וֹ מִיכָ֜ה <WH4318> And Micah שְׁבָ֣ה <WH3427> unto him Dwell עִמָּדִ֗י <WH5978> against וֶֽהְיֵה־ <WH1961> become לִי֮ לְאָ֣ב <WH1> with me and be unto me a father וּלְכֹהֵן֒ <WH3548> and a priest וְאָנֹכִ֨י <WH595> I אֶֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> and I will give לְךָ֜ עֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <WH6235> thee ten כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> [shekels] of silver לַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> by the year וְעֵ֥רֶךְ <WH6187> and a suit בְּגָדִ֖ים <WH899> of apparel וּמִחְיָתֶ֑ךָ <WH4241> and thy victuals וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went הַלֵּוִֽי׃ <WH3881> So the Levite

וַיּ֥וֹאֶל <WH2974> was content הַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3881> And the Levite לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> to dwell אֶת־ <WH854> with הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> with the man וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> became הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> and the young man ל֔וֹ כְּאַחַ֖ד <WH259> was unto him as one מִבָּנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> of his sons

וַיְמַלֵּ֤א <WH4390> accomplish מִיכָה֙ <WH4318> And Micah אֶת־ <WH853> יַ֣ד <WH3027> able הַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3881> the Levite וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> became ל֥וֹ הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> and the young man לְכֹהֵ֑ן <WH3548> became his priest וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> and lived בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> and was in the house מִיכָֽה׃ <WH4318> of Micah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said מִיכָ֔ה <WH4318> Micah עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> Now know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> seeing יֵיטִ֥יב <WH3190> will do me good יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I that the LORD לִ֑י כִּ֧י <WH3588> seeing הָיָה־ <WH1961> have לִ֛י הַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3881> seeing I have a Levite לְכֹהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> to [my] priest
